name: Brikbit
description: A small, mischievous critter formed from broken concrete and loose wires in abandoned city alleys.

name: Brikmash
description: Larger and tougher, Briknash uses chunks of urban rubble to bash enemies.

name: Quakenok
description: Quakenok can cause tremors beneath its feet, shaking enemies off-balance.

name: Titanorox
description: Towering like a crumbling skyscraper, Titanorix crushes foes with overwhelming force.

name: Citadrax
description: A living fortress, Citadrax absorbs attacks like a city absorbing a barrage.

name: Leaflit
description: A curious sprout-like critter, playful and eager to explore the world.

name: Leaflume
description: Blossoming into a guardian of the woods, Leaflume controls the breeze and forest growth.

name: Bloomnex
description: Bloomnex summons thorned vines and petals as sharp as blades.

name: Selvaterra
description: An ancient woodland spirit reborn, Selvaterra protects the heart of forests.

name: Gaialith
description: A living avatar of all nature, Gaialith commands jungles, forests, storms, and blossoms alike.

name: Sprox
description: A wandering junkbot made from discarded gears and broken drones.

name: Coreclank
description: Upgraded with sharper claws and better sensors, Sproxxon is ready for serious scavenging.

name: Ironvulk
description: A sleeker, heavily armored version of Sproxxon.

name: Hexgolem
description: A towering factory-on-legs, capable of dismantling foes.

name: Obliviron
description: A mechanized colossus with quantum-fueled weaponry.

name: Embercrit
description: A tiny critter formed from smoldering coals deep within volcanic craters.

name: Flareonix
description: Flareonix flickers with volatile flames, igniting anything it touches.

name: Magmahorn
description: With molten horns and steaming breath, Magmahorn charges enemies head-on.

name: Volcanox
description: A walking eruption, Volcanox can summon streams of molten rock.

name: Pyraxon
description: Legend says Pyraxon embodies the fury of a thousand volcanoes erupting at once.

name: Glitchip
description: A mischievous data-wisp formed from corrupted files and abandoned networks.

name: Glitchamp
description: Grown stronger, Glitchamp hacks nearby systems for its own benefit.

name: Glitchgeist
description: A phantom of cyberspace who stalks FTP servers, Glitchgeist distorts servers.

name: GhoulVirus
description: A cyberspace nightmare, the GhoulVirus is a rogue entity that pierces firewalls—and defenses—with ease.

name: Sovereign_Core_v2
description: A legendary Kernel-level malware said to control the corrupted machines of entire civilizations in the distant future.

name: Chilluff
description: A playful puff of living snow, darting and tumbling across frozen fields.

name: Arctapuff
description: Hardened into icy form, Arctapuff lashes enemies with frostbitten winds.

name: Cryozzard
description: A compact storm of snow and sleet, Cryozzard blinds foes in blizzards.

name: MegaGlacius
description: A towering being of glimmering ice, Cryostrala controls glacial forces.

name: AuroraChron
description: Said to race beneath the northern lights, AuroraChron freezes entire battlefields.

name: Bubbleek
description: A mischievous bubble critter bouncing from puddle to puddle.

name: Bubbleon
description: A faster, sharper swimmer who uses water jets to propel itself.

name: Shelltor
description: Hardened shell and sharper fins give Shelltor the upper hand.

name: Tyrrentor
description: A living typhoon, Torrenton engulfs foes in roaring whirlpools.

name: Abyssalar
description: Abyssalar commands the deep trenches where even light cannot escape.

name: Sparflik
description: A flickering flame critter crackling with unstable energy.

name: Sparflare
description: Growing fiercer, Sparflare launches mini-explosions of heat and static.

name: Voltaspike
description: A volatile critter that explodes in flares of charged plasma.

name: Ignistorm
description: Ignistorm rides electrical storms, burning and frying everything in its path.

name: Fusionplux
description: Fusionplux is a walking supernova, burning everything in its path.

name: Dustdrig
description: A gritty little critter, tough as desert sand and just as shifty.

name: Duneblitz
description: Master of mirages, Duneblitz can vanish and reappear at will.

name: Quartdramon
description: Tougher and heavier, Quartdramon rumbles through dunes like a living boulder.

name: Sandragoon
description: Sandragoon shapes the desert around it, collapsing dunes onto foes.

name: Lord Obliserra
description: Lord Obliserra twists sandstorms to erase enemies from sight.

name: Digitusk
description: A small critter shaped like a holographic boar, composed of fractal code.

name: Bitboar
description: Encrypted and armored, Bitboar hacks defenses before charging.

name: Cryptotuscan
description: Cloaked in a shell of pure encryption, Cryptotuscan shatters enemy barriers.

name: Aurelisk
description: Aurelisk erases obstacles with unstoppable force.

name: Emperor Tusk’Zar
description: Emperor Tusk’Zar transcends the binary code — a self-aware beast of pure algorithmic rage.

name: Mythiwing
description: A shimmering wisp with ancient runes carved into its feathers.

name: Mythivar
description: Its feathers harden into crystal blades that slash through reality itself.

name: Mythrylorn
description: Enshrouded in legends, Mythrylorn can rewrite the laws of nature.

name: Mythicarus
description: Mythicarus rides the winds of forgotten worlds.

name: Omega Mythicarus
description: A creature of pure myth, Omega Mytharion's cry can erase memories.

name: Radipup
description: A scrappy little critter glowing faintly green, born from contaminated ruins.

name: Radiantwolf
description: Its radioactive fur is weaponized, searing anything it brushes against.

name: Hazbeast
description: Hazbeast spreads radiation sickness wherever it roams.

name: Blighthulk
description: Blighthulk devours everything with acidic fangs.

name: Toxic Abominant
description: Toxic Abominants poison entire cities simply by existing near them.

name: Toxling
description: A sticky, writhing creature born from polluted marshes.

name: Poisonisk
description: Its claws drip with paralytic venom, stunning prey.

name: Venomlash
description: Venomlash’s body is corrosive, melting through armor.

name: Toxothorn
description: Faster and deadlier, Toxothorn poisons everything it touches.

name: Gigatox
description: Gigatox’s venom is feared across all realms.

name: Nebulyte
description: A fragment of a star, flickering between existence and dream.

name: Stellaray
description: Crystallized starlight flows through Stellaray’s body.

name: Astrelith
description: Astrelith is composed entirely of plasma and space dust.

name: Galaxine
description: Galaxine wields newborn galaxy forces, warping gravity itself.

name: Eclipsar
description: Eclipsar warps light, thought, and matter at will.

name: Wispawl
description: A floating spirit critter with sad, glowing eyes.

name: Spectuff
description: Gains semi-solid form, haunting its prey with unsettling howls.

name: Phantomax
description: Fades between realities, slipping past defenses.

name: Shadewisp
description: Dark as forgotten memories, Shadewisp curses foes.

name: Netherveil
description: Netherveil is the mist between life and death itself.

name: Vixitron
description: A cybernetic fox rebuilt by rogue engineers in 2287, swift, curious, and highly intelligent.

name: Vixadra
description: Wings enhanced with plasma cores, Vixadra slices the skies with light-speed dives.

name: Vixeknight
description: Evolved into a master of speed and plasma, Vixenite fires precise energy bolts.

name: Vixaeris
description: Vixaeon fuses with advanced AI, becoming a living weapon of light and information.

name: Vixaeon Prime
description: The perfected digital phoenix, capable of rewriting battlefields in nanoseconds.

name: Tortulith
description: A sturdy turtle critter with makeshift guns bolted onto its heavy shell.

name: Tortelance
description: Upgrades to twin reinforced cannons for short-range bombardments.

name: Tortarric
description: Even heavier now, Tortarric lumbers into battle like a mobile tank.

name: Tortaclysm
description: Carrying heavy artillery, Tortaclysm rains shells from long distances.

name: Tortageddon
description: A living fortress, Tortageddon is a war machine unstoppable in motion.

name: Nyxwing
description: A nocturnal data-gatherer, flying through dark networks, absorbing lost signals.

name: Nyxade
description: Faster and sleeker, Nyxshade manipulates sound and static waves.

name: Nocturnale
description: Energized with dark lightning, Nocturnvolt destabilizes enemy data streams.

name: UmbraWyvern
description: A specter of the net, UmbraWyvern phases in and out of existence.

name: Lunar Dragoon
description: A myth in dark web legend, Cybernoctus erases traces of existence wherever it flies.

name: Skidrix
description: A glitching lizard critter, twitching between dimensional seams.

name: Skidash
description: Stabilizes briefly, using its distortion to lash out unpredictably.

name: Reptirex
description: Completely unpredictable, Reptifexx bends light around it.

name: Mega Novachar
description: Collapsing probability fields, Novachar forces enemy errors.

name: Supreme Chaossaur
description: A cosmic mistake given form, Chaoskisaur embodies pure chaos.

name: Patchi
description: Patchi begins life as little more than a packet of data transferred to a physically weak but sturdy chassis in order to test its capabilities and bug testing. Yes, the developers are aware of the irony. Patchi is a friendly beetle that scuttles through junk files, scavenging trinkets.

name: Rolobug
description: Hardens its shell with fragmented data firewalls.

name: Atveetle
description: Upgrades its feelers to send shockwaves through enemy code.

name: Stagnator-X
description: Protects allies with a swirling shield of junk data.

name: MechaHerculoom
description: Patchtrix repairs and destroys systems alike, a trickster among cyberspace.

name: Zapkip
description: A jittery, yellow rodent crackling with static and energy surges.

name: Zappix
description: Sparks fly from its tail as it dashes between attacks.

name: Voltarix
description: Emits dangerous electrical fields that fry tech nearby.

name: Ampirra
description: Generates storm clouds as it races — thunder trails follow.

name: King Thundrake
description: Said to nest in lightning itself, Thundrake rides bolts from the sky.

name: Emberpaw
description: A small, fierce critter with ember trails left in its steps.

name: Blazehound
description: Mane of fire flares up during battle roars.

name: Infercarn
description: Glows white-hot in rage, heating the battlefield.

name: Alpha Pyrawulf
description: Born of wildfires, it becomes a living firestorm.

name: Sovereign Hellvyrn
description: Hellvyrn hunts in volcanic storms, its flames never extinguished.

name: Spriggop
description: A green pod-like critter that hops around with leafy limbs.

name: Sprungleaf
description: Sprouts thorns and vines for defense and entrapment.

name: Thornent
description: Gains bark-like armor and poisonous sap.

name: Verdanthorn
description: Commands wild growth to trap and crush foes.

name: King Overgrove
description: An ancient jungle guardian said to regrow from ashes.

name: Dribbin
description: A small, droplet-shaped crustacean that waddles and spits.

name: Drobbler
description: Develops a hard shell and high-pressure spit attacks.

name: Splashrak
description: Becomes faster in water, using bubble traps.

name: Aqualisk
description: A tidal-crab critter that slams enemies with wave energy.

name: Tsunaminx Crisis
description: A sea-bound calamity wrapped in coral and fury.

name: Snowkit
description: A kitten made of frost and fluff, leaves icy pawprints behind.

name: Frostuff
description: Its claws grow sharper than icicles, striking fast.

name: Glacetail
description: Can skate across surfaces and trap enemies in chill.

name: Cryosphinx
description: Silent and sleek, its presence causes the air to crystallize.

name: Mythic Nivyrin
description: Nivyrin is a mythic frost beast said to walk where snow never melts.
